sprint_goal: Establish core infrastructure and security foundation
key_deliverables: PostGIS DB, AKS, Auth Guard, Native Permission Config, Map Component
demo_objectives: Show DB connection, Valid JWT Auth, Mobile Location Permission Prompt, Map rendering
success_criteria: Infra provisioned; Auth endpoints secured; Mobile permissions working
risk_factors: Azure AD B2C complexity; Mobile OS permission constraints
mitigation_strategies: Early B2C prototype; Native module research

sprint_goal: Implement core business logic for routing and auditing
key_deliverables: Routing Service, Audit Service, Mobile Background Tracking, Map Drawing
demo_objectives: Geo-routing logic via API; Audit logs in OpenSearch; Background location updates
success_criteria: Routing tests pass; Logs indexed; Mobile tracks in background
risk_factors: Geospatial query performance; Mobile background kill

sprint_goal: Deliver offline capabilities and advanced visualization
demo_objectives: Offline app usage & sync; Admin heatmap visualization
success_criteria: Sync works without data loss; Heatmaps performant
